rules_text:
When Certhina Trainer enters, create a 3/3 green and white Beast creature token with trample.
{2}{GW}: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
rules_text2:
As a additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a non-Human creature.
Reveal the top card of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that creature onto the battlefield under your control with a +1/+1 counter on it. That creature is an artifact in addition to its other types.
